description: Forcing data for concentration-driven historical CMIP6 runs. Consolidated set of atmospheric concentration time series for the long-lived greenhouse-gases except N2O, including CO2, CH4, HFCs, PFCs, SF6, several ODS, and NF3 to serve as input for the CMIP6 Historical simulations.
name: HistoricalGHGNoN2O
longName: Historical Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Concentrations except N2O
keywords: Historical, Greenhouse Gas, GHG, no nitrous oxide, no N2O
